name: JellyTrailers
description: JellyTrailers runs inside Jellyfin and uses your server's movie/TV library roots. It downloads missing trailers via yt-dlp (auto-downloaded if not installed), writes trailer files next to each folder, and queues a library scan after each run. Configure in Dashboard → Plugins → JellyTrailers; scheduled task runs daily by default.
overview: Download movie and TV show trailers with yt-dlp and place them next to your media.

versions.changelog: Initial release. Download trailers with yt-dlp; auto-download yt-dlp when path empty. Supports movie and TV libraries; configurable quality, delay, max per run.
